Welcome to


The No.1 Trading Company in the Horn of Africa

WHO WE ARE.

Ileys Enterprises is a group of companies that manufactures detergent products as well as trades building materials to a wide range of customers and construction companies both locally and abroad. Ileys is a major manufacturing and marketing enterprise, with specialized expertise in the Horn of Africa.

We bring to your doorstep the best building materials from all around the world!

Soft & Hard Wood

Ileys offers a wide variety of specalized wood made for construction, imported from various regions such as Malaysia, Austria etc.

Iron Bars

We bring to you the finest iron from the top manufactures in the world. They come in various sizes and types

Iron sheet

Quality corrugated iron sheets of various gauges, colors, and sizes.

Plywood

Need a smooth surface, or provide an aesthetic to your home? Look no further than our Plywood that comes with all the different grades and sizes to fulfill your interior desinger

Tiles

Our Decorative Tiles come to you straight from the best producers in India and Iran. These patterns and gloss will leave anyone speechless
